thread.title: Budget hotel near Pigalle arean
thread.title_full: Budget hotel near Pigalle arean - Review of Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sannatravel
title: Budget hotel near Pigalle arean
text:
Standard hotel near Pigalle area, good local transportation connection. Very good service at the reception from spanish guy. Breakfast a bit dirty and when we went at 9.30 nearly everything was finished. Thats the only minus of the hotel. Area generally is good and quiet.
Room Tip: Go to the breakfast early See more room tips
